ygData.subject: Re: What's missing in Everquest?
ygData.msgSnippet: Forgive me if I didn t see the original post, but does that in anyway justify the flame that was sent... and might I add yours.  I only read someone s reaction
ygData.messageBody:
Forgive me if I didn't see the original post, but does that in anyway
justify the flame that was sent... and might I add yours. I only read
someone's reaction and I wanted to make an attempt to halt any further post
in that direction. Unfortunately you felt the need to personally attack
me.. therefore might I repeat my suggestion.

Please refrain from personal attacks on people, everyone is entitled to
their opinion. This is how ideas are exchanged.

Thanks for your understanding.

If that statement in someway offends you.. I apologize.

Ves



-----Original Message-----
From: Coot402@... [mailto:Coot402@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 4:25 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] What's missing in Everquest?


From: Coot402@...

>Mike please refrain from personal attacks on people, everyone is entitled
to
>their opinion. This is how ideas are exchanged.

>Thanks for your understanding.

>Ves
let me refresh your memory a little, the original letter here was written
with, shall we say not the best spelling.
this comment was then added

>If English is your 2nd language, then I aplologize for this post. That
said,
>GOOD LORD MAN get a dictionary!!!!! Your spelling is so bad I can't even
>read your post.
>
>Wizaro

Now this is totally wrong. and mike posts this.

>Bah. Get a life. I have no problems with that and I'm from Sweden. I know I
>can't spell very well but at least I try and succeed many times (unless
>dumbasses like you add a "nice" post)

>Sorry just a bit frustrated.

>Cheers,

>Mikael Laine / MCSE
>System Engineer

And you want to bust him. Give me a break. Why didn't you post that after
Wizaro. Not everyone speaks good english, and if we are going to bust people

when they try. why don't you go and try playing a game based in France and
see how good your French is
